## add variable

Adds first argument and second argument.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
add: {
    (a: number, b: number): number;
    (a: number): (b: number) => number;
    (a: bigint, b: bigint): bigint;
    (a: bigint): (b: bigint) => bigint;
}
```

## Example 1


```ts
// Basic
add(1, 2) // 3

```

## Example 2


```ts
// Bigint
add(1n, 2n) // 3n

```

## Example 3


```ts
// Curry
const plus2(2)
plus2(-3) // -1

```
